name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Alseta's Passage: A Pathbuilder Discord Bot

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Creates a safe passageway for your rolls from pathbuilder to discord

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Alseta's Passage is a Pathbuilder2e to Discord Exporter tool designed for tabletop RPG enthusiasts, specifically those who use Pathbuilder2e for their Pathfinder 2nd Edition character management. This extension seamlessly bridges the gap between Pathbuilder2e and Discord, making it easier than ever to share your character's rolls and details with your gaming group.

Key Features:

- Roll Sharing: Instantly export your character's rolls from Pathbuilder2e to your designated Discord channel, allowing your party to see your results in real-time.

- Detailed Character Information: Share comprehensive details about your character's skills, spells, weapons, feats, and more with just a click.

- Easy Integration: Set up in minutes. All you need is a webhook URL from your Discord server owner to start sending messages.

- Effortless Collaboration: Enhance your gaming sessions by keeping everyone informed and engaged with up-to-date character information.

How to Use:
- Get a Webhook URL: Request a webhook URL from your Discord server owner or administrator.
- Install the Extension: Add the Pathbuilder2e to Discord Exporter to your Chrome browser.
- Configure the Webhook: Enter the provided webhook URL in the extension settings.
- Start Sharing: Use the extension to export rolls and character details directly to your chosen Discord channel.

Transform your Pathfinder 2nd Edition gameplay experience by keeping your group in the loop with the Pathbuilder2e to Discord Exporter. Stay connected, stay informed, and keep the adventure rolling!

Want to support us https://ko-fi.com/alsetaspassage
